extension_description.message: Enjoy the web in dark mode. DarkReader supports certain websites in a customized way!

extension_command.description: The keyboard shortcut to enable/disable the extension
extension_command.message: Activate/deactivate the extension on a website

install_page_title.description: The title of the install's page

install_text_title.description: The text's title in the install's page
install_text_title.message: The DarkReader extension has been installed!

install_text_description.description: The text under the title in the install's page
install_text_description.message: The extension has been installed successfully.

update_page_title.description: The title of the update's page

update_text_title.description: The title of the update's page
update_text_title.message: The DarkReader extension has been updated

update_text_description.message: The extension has been updated successfully.

popup_terms_text.description: The text to ask the user to read the privacy policy
popup_terms_text.message: Please read our Privacy Policy before proceeding.

popup_error_unsupported_title.description: Large text to say that the page is not supported by the extension
popup_error_unsupported_title.message: DarkReader is not supported on this page

popup_error_unsupported_description.description: The small text to say that the page is not supported by the extension
popup_error_unsupported_description.message: This page is not optimized for DarkReader, so it is not active on this site.

popup_options_help_whitelist.description: The text 'Put "*" to represent an unknown element'
popup_options_help_whitelist.message: Put "*" to represent an unknown element.

popup_options_help_whitelist_2.description: The text 'Put "@@" to represent a not whitelisted element'
popup_options_help_whitelist_2.message: Put "@@" to represent a not whitelisted element

popup_options_custom_only.description: The text for the option on custom only
popup_options_custom_only.message: Modify only pages with custom support:
